alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 3:28PM MST until June 23 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 328 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blackwater, or 9 miles northwest of Coolidge, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Casa Grande, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, Blackwater, Chandler Heights, San Tan Valley, Seville, Bapchule, Olberg, San Tan Mountain Park, Sacaton and Santan. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 172 and 190. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 137 and 162. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
